items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United monitor Bournemouth duo Adams, Scott
items.description: Manchester United drew 4-4 with Bournemouth on Monday but are scouting two of their midfielders: Alex Scott and Tyler Adams. Transfer Talk has the lat...

items.title: Flagg youngest ever to score 40 as Mavs fall in OT
items.description: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg became the youngest player in NBA history to score 40 points after he dropped 42 in an overtime loss Monday.

items.title: Rockets' Udoka lashes out at refs after OT loss
items.description: Rockets coach Ime Udoka was critical of the officiating after his team's OT loss to the Nuggets, calling out the crew for inconsistent calls.

items.title: Chiefs' Mahomes has surgery for torn ACL, LCL

items.title: Rodgers says win made extra special by 'castoffs'
